english.segment1: There is no reason to run anymore. No reason to hide away. Since He's come into my life. He's brought sunshine to my day
english.segment2: (chorus). I will let my light shine. No more shadows. I will let my light shine. Darkness run away. I will let my light shine. For a bright tomorrow. I will let my light shine
english.segment3: No more casting shadows. No more living lies. Since He's come into my life. He's brought sunshine to my skies
